Rulings.Edison:
●When The Eye of Truth is activated in a chain you don't see your opponent’s hand until The Eye of Truth resolves. So if The Eye of Truth is step 3 in a 5 step chain, steps 5 and 4 will resolve, then The Eye of Truth resolves and your opponent reveals his/her hand, then steps 2 and 1 resolve.
●When The Eye of Truth is active and a card such as Robbin’ Goblin requires that the opponent discard a card from their hand randomly, the opponent should hide and shuffle his hand, discard a random card, and then reveal their hand again.
